prompt: A noise in the darkness beyond the garden—something large shifting. Chitin immediately moves to position itself between the sound and Howen, tiny mandibles raised in threat despite its small size. Protection instinct, even from something so young. Chitin in protective stance, body tense, facing the darkness while purple light from the garden illuminates its brave silhouette. Style: Guardian stance, protective behavior. Mood: Alert, protective, brave despite size.
caption: When danger stirred, Chitin stood ready. For me.
narration: It would die for me. I knew it then. This small creature, this friend, would put itself between me and any threat. The thought broke my heart and healed it at once.
